mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VACATION_MANAGEMENT(id, employeeId, dates, reason) VALUES (VACATION_MANAGEMENT_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{employeeId}, ${dates}, #{reason})

INSERT INTO VACATION(id, employeeId, vacationDate, approvalId, startDate, reason, type) VALUES (VACATION_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{employeeId}, ${vacationDate}, #{approvalId}, #{startDate}, #{reason}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(dates) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(dates) END FROM VACATION_MANAGEMENT WHERE employeeId = #{employeeId}

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(vacationDate) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(vacationDate) END FROM VACATION JOIN APPROVAL ON VACATION.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE VACATION.employeeId = #{employeeId} AND APPROVAL.state = 'SUBMIT'

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(vacationDate) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(vacationDate) END FROM VACATION JOIN APPROVAL ON VACATION.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE VACATION.employeeId = #{employeeId} AND TRUNC(VACATION.regDate, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND APPROVAL.state = 'SUBMIT'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VACATION JOIN APPROVAL ON VACATION.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE VACATION.employeeId = #{employeeId} AND SYSDATE >= STARTDATE + NUMTODSINTERVAL(VACATIONDATE, 'DAY') AND APPROVAL.state = 'SUBMIT'

SELECT * FROM VACATION JOIN APPROVAL ON VACATION.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE startDate + NUMTODSINTERVAL(vacationDate, 'DAY') > SYSDATE AND APPROVAL.state = 'SUBMIT' AND VACATION.employeeId NOT IN
#{employeeId}

SELECT employeeId as id FROM VACATION JOIN APPROVAL ON VACATION.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE startDate + NUMTODSINTERVAL(vacationDate, 'DAY') > TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND VACATION.employeeId NOT IN
#{employeeId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT startDate + NUMTODSINTERVAL(vacationDate, 'DAY') as endDate, VACATION.* FROM VACATION JOIN APPROVAL ON VACATION.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE APPROVAL.state = 'SUBMIT') A WHERE A.employeeId = #{employeeId} AND ( TRUNC(endDate) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR TRUNC(startDate) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} )

SELECT startDate + NUMTODSINTERVAL(vacationDate, 'DAY') as endDate, VACATION.*, APPROVAL.state FROM VACATION JOIN APPROVAL ON VACATION.approvalId = APPROVAL.id WHERE VACATION.employeeID = #{employeeId}

SELECT EMPLOYEE_DETAIL.id FROM EMPLOYEE_DETAIL WHERE MOD((TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(HIREDDATE)) , 30) = 0 AND MOD((TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(HIREDDATE)) , 360) != 0 AND 365 > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(HIREDDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) != TRUNC(HIREDDATE)

SELECT EMPLOYEE_DETAIL.id AS employeeId, TRUNC((TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(HIREDDATE)) / 365) AS yearOfService FROM EMPLOYEE_DETAIL WHERE MOD((TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(HIREDDATE)) , 365) = 0 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) != TRUNC(HIREDDATE)
SELECT * FROM VACATION v JOIN APPROVAL a ON v.approvalId = a.id WHERE v.approvalId = #{approvalId}
